- Fishing activity near WQ-02, anglers informed of monitoring
- Tributary inflow at RM 22.4 contributing normal baseflow
- Cr at WQ-03: 55 µg/L recorded

### Compliance Flags
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-03 (55 µg/L) approaching MCL threshold (100 µg/L)

### Events
- WQ-02 sonde guard replaced after collision damage
- Regional drought index: D0 (atypically dry)
- Lab turnaround for metals panel: 5 business days

### Notes
- Day 20 monitoring. Cr spatial gradient: WQ-01(3), WQ-02(3), WQ-03(55), WQ-04(33.6), WQ-05(22.6), WQ-06(15.0). Compliance review in progress.
